My wants/needs are limited, but if you don't ask, you don't know .... ;)

Here is what I'm looking for:

1 -- SL Hindu -- Ellam, Foster, and Mullaney.

2 -- Any AB, Cycle, or Tolstoi (as available): Cross (:eek:); Shaw, Prov.

3 -- Any EPDG, Hindu, OM, or Sov.150 (as available):  Bridwell, no cap; Jones, hips; Lajoie, portrait; Mathewson, white cap.

4 –- Duffy – AB460 or EPDG.

5 -- Any lower grade Hindus that I don't have.

6 –- Lots of 25 or more (for project; still only working half normal hours, and bored to death :().

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Easy as that ----- 

Thanks, Scott :rolleyes:
